instruction: Given a description of a person's physical appearance, generate a character description fitting the provided description.
output: Bob was a well-built man standing at 5'6" tall. His head glowed with a brilliant silver halo of hair and his eyes glowed a brilliant violet. His skin was tan and weathered, like a man comfortable with the outdoors. He wore blue overalls and a worn work shirt, his hands calloused and his nails short.
